title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path is incorrect in declare warning on binary files. When targeting .class files from injars, the source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. The filenames may also not appear at all, although these tests do not reproduce that problem. To see the problem, please refer to the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/..
OB: The declare warning messages for binary files include the source path in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. Sometimes, the filenames do not appear at all, but this issue is not reproducible with the provided tests.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Run the test cases in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. folder.
2. Observe the declare warning messages for binary files and notice that the source path is incorrectly listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
